page.title: 03COMMUNICATIONS, KINGSBARNS
page.content: { {POSTAL SERVICE, KINGSBARNS} MONDAY TO FRIDAY, TWO COLLECTIONS PER DAY AND ONE COLLECTION ON SATURDAY. MONDAY TO SATURDAY, ONE COLLECTION PER DAY. {CUSTOMS, KINGSBARNS} {FIRING OF THE GUN: ON OLD YEAR'S NIGHT PEOPLE GATHER IN THE SQUARE. A SHOT IS FIRED TO HASTEN THE DEPARTURE OF THE OLD YEAR. ANOTHER SHOT IS THEN FIRED TO HASTEN IN THE NEW YEAR. {FLOWER SHOW, KINGSBARNS} THIS IS HELD EVERY AUGUST IN THE MEMORIAL HALL. FLOWERS AND VEGETABLES ARE JUDGED. TROPHIES AND CERTIFICATES ARE AWARDED. {CHILDREN'S WORK PAINTINGS OF FLOWERS AND HANDWRITING EXERCISES ARE JUDGED. PRIZES ARE AWARDED.
